name: Alex Jordan
title: Full Stack Software Engineer
summary: Passionate Full Stack Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and APIs. Expert in modern JavaScript frameworks, Python, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of leading development teams and delivering high-quality software solutions that improve user experience and business outcomes.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Lead a team of 4 engineers in developing and maintaining microservices architecture serving 100K+ daily active users
Architected and implemented a real-time analytics dashboard using React, Node.js, and WebSocket technology, improving data visibility by 300%
Optimized database queries and implemented Redis caching, reducing API response times by 60%
Mentored junior developers and established code review practices that improved code quality and reduced bugs by 40%
Collaborated with product managers and designers to deliver 15+ feature releases using Agile methodologies

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Python Django and FastAPI, serving data to mobile and web applications
Built responsive web applications using React and TypeScript, improving user engagement by 45%
Implemented automated testing suites with 90% code coverage using Jest, Pytest, and Selenium
Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and AWS, reducing deployment time by 80%
Collaborated with data science team to integrate machine learning models into production applications

experience.title: Junior Software Developer
description: Developed full-stack web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js for early-stage startup
Created and maintained PostgreSQL database schemas and optimized queries for performance
Implemented user authentication and authorization systems using JWT and OAuth2
Participated in daily standups and sprint planning as part of a cross-functional Agile team
Contributed to open-source projects and maintained comprehensive technical documentation

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: EcoTrack - Personal Carbon Footprint Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack web application that helps users track and reduce their carbon footprint. Features include data visualization, goal setting, and social sharing. Gained 5000+ active users within 6 months.

projects.name: TaskFlow - Project Management API
projects.description: RESTful API for project management with features including task assignment, time tracking, and team collaboration. Implemented microservices architecture with comprehensive documentation.

projects.name: SmartHome Dashboard
projects.description: IoT dashboard for monitoring and controlling smart home devices. Real-time data updates using WebSocket connections and responsive design for mobile and desktop.

awards: Employee of the Year - TechFlow Solutions (2023)
Outstanding Senior Project Award - Computer Science Department (2019)
